page.title: 12BOOKS ABOUT MIDHURST
page.content: Mr.Vic Mitchell is a well known local writer.The first book he wrote about Midhurst was called "Branch Lines To Midhurst."Since then he has written 13 more books and says he may write more. When Mr.Mitchell writes a book he does not do it all by himself but he collaborates with Keith Smith or his wife Barbara Mitchell.Usually when they write a book they use their earlier books.The most difficult part of the task is collecting the material and photographs.Mr.Mitchell gathers his information from books and helpful people.It takes months to gather the information and two weeks to write the book.They do not print their own books.Most of the books have been about local railway history but Mr.Mitchell has also written "Midhurst Town-Then and Now.",a history of the town which he believes will change.
